name: IFJ PAN Repository
description: The repository of the Institute of Nuclear Physics Polish Academy of Sciences collects, stores and shares documents that are the result of research work of the Institute's employees and doctoral students. Its purpose is to disseminate the scientific achievements of employees and promote scientific research conducted at the Institute. Access to bibliographic descriptions of deposited works and to the full texts of documents archived in the Repository of IFJ PAN is by default open to all users.
owner_name: Institute of Nuclear Physics Polish Academy of Sciences
